<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Limited">[Rime Slick](/Spells.aspx?ID=632)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 78</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Area** 15-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call down a chill wind. When you Cast this Spell, you deal 2d4 cold damage to each creature in the area (basic Reflex save). If a creature in the area critically fails its Reflex save and was standing, it also falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

 You also create a layer of ice on all surfaces in the area, which become difficult terrain. Unattended objects in the area become slick with ice, and picking them up requires a successful Reflex save or [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check against your spell DC. The ice melts on any object that takes fire damage as well as in any square included in the area of a higher-level spell or effect with the [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) trait.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The damage increases to 8d4 cold damage and the area is a 30-foot burst.

**Heightened (8th)** The damage increases to 14d4 cold damage and the area is a 60-foot burst.
